name: No Negative News (NNN)
description:
Fake News, Fake News Everywhere!

Are you sick of lies, hoaxes, and seeing your family members fall for even the most obvious ones all the time? 

Well you're in luck! we, at NoNegativeNews are currently opening a new 'No Fake News' division and we are looking for passionate and annoyed people for an editorial position for it!

Help us destroy lies and deceit today!

What's The Job?

No Negative News is a game where you have to cross check articles with other articles and official reports to find out which fact lines up with the facts and which ones don't. Do it right and you might make the world a better place... or if you're careless, potentially worse! so be careful!

Credits

Rifqi Adam - Publication

This game is made as a part of Binus Game Development Club's PKM project (Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat/Community Service) alongside two other games, find out more about us on our twitter page!

https://twitter.com/pkmBGDC

And if you don't mind, we would really appreciate if you could fill in our survey so that we can track data on players of our games and their countries of origin for our final report ^^

https://binusgdc.com/pkmbgdc22

Thanks For Playing!
